mapper.select: SELECT qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME as jobName, qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP as jobGroup, qrtz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME as jobClassName, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME AS triggerName, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP AS triggerGroup, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_STATE as triggerState, qrtz_triggers.START_TIME as startTime, qrtz_triggers.END_TIME as endTime, qrtz_cron_triggers.CRON_EXPRESSION as cronExpression, qrtz_cron_triggers.TIME_ZONE_ID as timeZoneId FROM qrtz_job_details JOIN qrtz_triggers JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers ON qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME = qrtz_triggers.JOB_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME = qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP
select count(1) from qrtz_triggers where JOB_NAME=#{jobName}
select TRIGGER_STATE FROM qrtz_triggers where JOB_NAME=#{jobName} and JOB_GROUP=#{jobGroup}
